revision.text:
<!--나라_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Country
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 현지이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = anthem }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 정부형태 | ontologyProperty = governmentType }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 통화 | ontologyProperty = currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라_표어 | ontologyProperty = motto }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수도 | ontologyProperty = capital }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 최대도시 | ontologyProperty = largestCity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 공용어 | ontologyProperty = officialLanguage }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지도자_칭호 | ontologyProperty = leaderTitle }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지도자_이름 | ontologyProperty = leaderName }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 면적 | ontologyProperty = area | unit = squareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 내수면_비율 | ontologyProperty = percentageOfAreaWater }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인구밀도 | ontologyProperty = populationDensity | unit = inhabitantsPerSquareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인구어림년도 | ontologyProperty = populationAsOf }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인구_순위 | ontologyProperty = populationTotalRanking }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = GDP_PPP | ontologyProperty = grossDomesticProduct }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = GDP_PPP_년도 | ontologyProperty = grossDomesticProductAsOf }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가도메인 | ontologyProperty = topLevelDomain }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 통화 | ontologyProperty = currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국제전화번호 | ontologyProperty = areaCode }}



end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping

|주권=

|면적_순위=
|내수면_비율=
|어림인구수=
|인구조사년도=
|조사인구수=
|인구밀도_순위=
|GDP_PPP_순위=
|일인당_GDP_PPP=
|일인당_GDP_PPP_순위=
|지니 계수=
|통화기호=
|단위=
|시간대=
|UTC_시차=
|일광절약시간=
|ISO1=
|ISO2=
|ISO3=
|보충설명=
-->
